title: Should You Quit Your Job?
itunes:title: Should You Quit Your Job?
description:
85% of people in the US don't enjoy their jobs, yet they spend the majority of their waking hours working. That is why I think that if you have a job that you hate, then it is a waste of your life. In this episode, I am going to dive into that topic and try to help you see that if you hate your job, you should quit!

Follow me on Instagram for more inspiration: https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
